title: Union Berlin — the anti-establishment club - Bavarian Football Works
snippet: It’s become a world where only the traditional European football powerhouses or the newly bought billionaires’ clubs can compete at the highest level. The European football market is thriving. There’s been an increase in investments after the pandemic — partly due to the economic and political profits for the owners. Football has continued its ‘hyper-capitalistic’ path, and only a few stakeholders can be at the top. It’s this rather dull and annoyingly predictable situation that makes you appreciate teams like Union Berlin even more.
